description: This is a traditional Sicilian dessert doughnut served on 19th March, the feast day of Saint Joseph.
keywords: Doughnut,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Rice,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Italian Doughnuts Sfinci di Riso Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice by boiling in water with a pinch of salt, adding more water to overcook rice for best results.
When finished cooking, while still hot, drain the rice and pass it through a potato masher/ricer.
Place pur√©ed rice into a bowl. Make a well in the centre, adding sugar, cinnamon, sultanas and egg; then combine well.
Slowly fold flour into mix until spoon stands upright. Do not over mix! Rest mixture at room temperature for approx. 10-15mins.
Heat oil in a saucepan. Drop a tablespoon of mixture into hot oil. Turn often until golden brown. Drain on a paper towel and toss the sfinci into mixture of sugar and cinnamon.
